trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许的操作安全<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref>要应用于使用声明性安全的代码。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> value that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用的值。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: DataProtectionPermissionAttribute is used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: DataProtectionPermissionAttribute 仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，请使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>类。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionAttribute"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be called by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法仅应由安全系统中，永远不会由应用程序代码调用。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns.
trans-unit.target: 从权限，此方法返回创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"></xref> that corresponds to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission"> </xref>相对应的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data protection permissions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据保护权限。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data can be encrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以使用加密数据<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为`false`、<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>发生时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以加密数据;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be encrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以使用加密内存<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If the value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为`false`、<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>发生时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Protect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if memory can be encrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以加密内存;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether data can be unencrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以数据以未加密状态使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为`false`、<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>发生时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data can be unencrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果数据可以是未加密;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether memory can be unencrypted using the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以内存以未加密状态使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `false`, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> occurs when the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值为`false`、<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>发生时<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>调用方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory.Unprotect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if memory can be unencrypted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果内存可以将未加密;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
